column5: Going to land-o-lakes lodge,It's located in Clarendon,On.I'am there from june 3 to the 9. I'll be fishing on Crotch Lake for walleye or smallmouth. Anyone have any tips or info.

have stayed in land-o-lakes for almost 30 years, off and on. nice camp, good food, nice people. boat docks raise heck with you on windy days. you will work hard for your fish, really hard. i miss the place, but i'm moving on. 10 hr. trip and no fish, i don't think so.
